snippet: In the Mendoza region of Argentina, winemakers are using soil pits partly to educate visitors, but also to educate themselves.
abstract: Eric Asimov The Pour column explores varieties of wines grown on Bodega Catena Zapata’s Adrianna Vineyard, in Mendoza Province of Argentina, that deviate from region's traditional malbec.
lead_paragraph: In the Mendoza region of Argentina, winemakers are using soil pits partly to educate visitors, but also to educate themselves.

headline.main: To Move Beyond Malbec, Look Below the Surface
